ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
((ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(4 of 12) Due Diligence/Process Shadow")|| (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(5 of 12) Internal Brief of Findings/Concerns")|| (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(6 of 12) Proposals Presented to Prospect")|| (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(7 of 12) Building Conversion Timeline") || (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(8 of 12) Kick Off Meeting") || (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(9 of 12) Client Training") || (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(10 of 12) First Payroll Run") || (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(12 of 12) Transfer to Ongoing Support") || (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(11 of 12) Post Run Debrief")
)))))))))
&&
OR ( ISBLANK( Decision_Maker__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Decision Maker is a Required Field
